summary: The diff implements all three requirements. A raw-marks percentage table for grades 9-12 with Term 1 and Term 2 columns was added, a frequency-polygon chart visualizing combined percentage distribution was created, and both components were integrated into ProgressView (which is part of AcademicModule). Evidence from ProgressView.tsx and frontend-file-summaries.txt confirms all requested features are present.

hallucinated_features.description: Sortable functionality added to the main academic entries table with sorting by grade, term, termPercentage, and timestamp fields
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention sorting for the main academic entries table. REQ-1 mentions the raw-marks percentage table should be sortable, but the diff shows sorting logic applied to the main entries table as well.

hallucinated_features.description: Statistics cards displaying average, highest, lowest percentages and total entries count
hallucinated_features.reason: Statistics cards showing averagePercentage, highestPercentage, lowestPercentage, and totalEntries were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Trend data chart with index-based plotting
hallucinated_features.reason: The trendData useMemo creates a data structure for trend visualization that was not requested in the BuildRequest or requirements.
